question:
Consider the following terms in news to things which they are associated:
  1. ICGS Sujay - Offshore Patrol Vessel
  2. INS Astradharini - Torpedo launch and recovery vessel
  3. Muktashree - New anti-diabetic medicine
Which of the above is/are correct?
explanation: ICGS Sujay is an Offshore Patrol Vessel (OPV) that was recently commissioned into Indian Coast Guard (ICG). It is sixth and last in the series of six 105m OPV built indigenously by Goa Shipyard Limited for ICG. INS Astradharini is an indigenously built Torpedo Launch and Recovery Vessel. <u>Third pair is incorrectly matched</u> because Muktashree is a rice variety has been developed which restricts assimilation of Arsenic within permissible limit. The variety has been released to farmers of West Bengal.
